Dr Girija is very professional and takes very good care of patients .She takes time to discuss any issues and I never feel rushed at the appointments. I appreciate her detailed responses. I love her being my kids' pediatrician. I feel very lucky to have choose her as my kids' paediatrician and I highly recommend her.

review: Dr. Girija goes to the root cause of the issue discussed and treats it effectively. She is very patient and gives general health improvement tips. She is very friendly and understanding to the child.

review: I have taken video conltation for my daughter calf pain, over all I'm satisfied her evaluation and suggestion, but I hope this feedback is too early, because the Dr.  suggested Medicine for 6 months, I understand that nothing will improve in 2-3 days. atleast we have to wait 10-15 days find the improvement vitamin deficiency, since given only one dose of Vit D3, let us wait and watch for good result and feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My 3 yo kid has been prone to rashes for last few months. we had seen multiple Doctors but it kept recurring.But Dr Girija suggeted a more holistic approach by advising on how to prevent insect bites with minimal medication.this has worked wonderfully for us. highly recommended doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I strongly recommend Dr. Girija for all the pediatric health issues.  She has been the best in her communication,  explaination of medical related issues,  treatment and does a very good follow up too. I have consulted many a times for all sorts of medical issues for my baby.  Her treatment has given me good results always.  All the very best DR. Girija. Keep doing good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: we were looking for a good paediatrician, when a family friend recommended Dr Girija some 2 years back. Once we consulted her, we knew we have found the right doctor for our boys aged 1 and 4.She is patient, describe the ailment and solution in detail. does not write unnecessary medications. plus their clinic is also very hygienic. we would recommend her strongly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: very nice experience with Dr Girija. She is  very much friendly  and having patience in listening us.  She won't prescribe unwanted medicines. She will educate us the causes of underlying health issues of baby and how to prevent. In a single line, she knows her job very well!!
